SEARCH
Package it.unipv.ingsfw.JavaBeats.dao.collection

Interface ICollectionDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
CollectionDAO
public interface ICollectionDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing operations related to the JBCollection entity in the database. This interface provides methods to perform Insert, Remove, Update, Get operations on Album, Playlist and Podcast records. It also allows to select JBCollection by their creators.
See Also:
  • JBCollection
  • Album
  • Playlist
  • Podcast

  • Method Details

    • insert

      JBCollection insert(JBCollection collection) throws AccountNotFoundException
      Inserts a new JBCollection record in the database.
      Parameters:
      collection - collection to add
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException

    • remove

      void remove(JBCollection collection)
      Removes a JBCollection record from the database.
      Parameters:
      collection - collection to delete

    • update

      void update(JBCollection collection) throws AccountNotFoundException
      Updates a JBCollection record in the database. Note that an Album cannot be updated.
      Parameters:
      collection - collection to update
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException

      Returns:
